Type.Name: ProgressBarOrientation

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProgressBarOrientation extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: An enumeration representing possible orientations and growth directions for the visible .
Docs.remarks: An enumeration representing possible orientations and growth directions for the visible .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ProgressBarOrientation BottomToTop = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A vertical growing from bottom to top.
Docs.remarks: A vertical growing from bottom to top.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ProgressBarOrientation LeftToRight = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A horizontal growing from left to right.
Docs.remarks: A horizontal growing from left to right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ProgressBarOrientation RightToLeft = int32(1)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ProgressBarOrientation TopToBottom = int32(3)
